extendedInfo.description: As seen on the Verizon commercial, Techcrunch, Wired Magazine and more. 1st place winner in Verizon's Power Your App Contest!Save your location when you park and Car Locator will help you find your car-Radar/Map/Split-Screen view-Parking timer-Beam your current or saved location to another phone/email-Home screen widget for quick save-Shake to save-Double tap on map to save -Save notes and photos-Location history-Location favorites-Manual coordinate entry-View current and car coordinates (great for geocaching)-Driving directions-Sonar sound-Customizable background images-Radar visualizations-Live wallpaper always points to your car-Customizable radar visualization-Automatically save location on bluetooth disconnect or car undock-Automatically save, sync, and import location with your Evernote account.Permissions explanation: READ_CONTACTS - Car Locator has the ability to "beam" your location to another user who has Car Locator installed. You can select the recipient of your location by using your contact listSEND_SMS/RECEIVE_SMS - The "beam" communication is done through SMS. This is why the SMS permission is required. No SMS's are sent without your explicit action. Tags: Find Car, Car Locator, Car Finder

reviews.title: Love all the option
reviews.comment: Just got it and it works good and the option to take pics and take note is handy it a well rounded app all good.
reviews.author: Wilfredo guero

reviews.title: Very handy & worth the money.
reviews.comment: Car Locator does what it says it will do. Its neither a CPU hog, nor a gobbler of wireless bandwidth. Installed on an HTC One using T-Mobile\'s network, I like that CL is car-mode aware. When I remove the phone from the HTC1s car dock cradle, Car Locator automatically takes a GPS read of my location. I don\'t even have to think about it. The direction finder seems to be fairly accurate. Have had no trouble with CL crashing itself or other running apps I run with it like Google Maps, SiriusXM.
reviews.author: James Wrightsman

reviews.title: Im here..
reviews.comment: Are we there yet.. Lost no more.. One of the best tools to find your car or starting place while walking, ect..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hard to locate
reviews.comment: I find it difficult to use and can\'t really pinpoint my car. I tried the free trial but didn\'t have a chance to actually test it since every time I opened and closed the app it counted as a trial. Would like a refund.
reviews.author: Lisa Alony

reviews.title: Carfinder
reviews.comment: A truly excellent tool, wish I had it at Philip Island earlier this year, it would have lead me straight to my car !!
reviews.author: John Dunphy

reviews.title: Doesn\'t save location
reviews.comment: Other GPS apps I have work fine, but this 1 usually doesn\'t save a location on my samsung galaxy s3 when used in conjunction with Bluetooth. Please fix!
reviews.author: John Daniel

reviews.title: Does exactly what it\'s supposed to do
reviews.comment: Very accurate, flexible and easy to use. Hasn\'t failed me once--one of my most used apps.
reviews.author: Doug Cox

reviews.title: Nexus
reviews.comment: Leaving work at 11pm helps me find my car every time. Easy to use with great features.
reviews.author: Don Tucker

reviews.title: Russell
reviews.comment: I love this app. Don\'t use it much at home.  When I am away from home it is the best thing since sliced bread.strange location/ shopping a show or a benda head gets turned around where is the car. I do not have a clue. This app knows there it is. In 2 years it has never missed. Easy to use. Just set location and once that is done you will find your car.
reviews.author: Russell Costin

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Well done. Wish it could make up for Motorola\'s shortcomings and connect to GPS faster automatically.

reviews.title: Dan
reviews.comment: Great application I would recommend it to anyone who has ever forgotten where they have parked their vehicles.

reviews.title: Pretty Cool

reviews.comment: I always get out of my car and pay no attention to where I parked it. This app is awesome. Brian
